item.title: PLY: Compilers in Python
item.description:
Description

Tytu≈Ç/Topic: PLY: Compilers in Python Prelegent/Speaker: Robert Szefler

A fast paced tour of parsing and a nice tool to do it in Python: PLY. Will include general intro to context free grammars, so no formal background required.

http://pl.pycon.org/2014/pl/agenda
